choices: Silver, remembering how hard things have been agrees
Silver disagrees but Gold forces the mask on him to change his mind
Silver and Gold argue until Silver tries to brainwash the idea out of Golds head
Silver is hesitant and needs time to think about it
Something else
1.content:
Silver entered the dusty lab "Gold? Are you here?" the Hedgehog had been asked to meet his friend here in private, Gold had been acting strangley since the council had been defeated, he hoped she was alright.
Thankfully his worry was lost when the cloaked tenrec came in smiling, "You didn't need to call out, I could sense you worrying."
"Ah... Could you... maybe not read my mind without asking? I don't want you thinking I'm weird." Silver asked, blushing.
"I can try, but I already know about you seeing me naked that one time in the hot springs" Gold remaked teasingly.
"Hey I didn't see any-" Silvers protests were cut off as Gold placed a mask with six dots on it on the table "Whats this?"
"My old mask, they used it to try to brainwash me, but I was able to block it's effects with my powers." Gold explained before continuing.
"Silver, if we use this in combination with my powers. We could change how a person thinks. Wouldn't that be an easier way to make a better future than talking to people who never listen?"
1.title: The Mask

11.content:
"This is nuts but...." Silver smiled at Gold "I think you might be right!"
Gold smiled "R-Really? You don't think it sounds mean?"
Silver shook his head "It's not my first option, but nothing else seems to work, this seems like it's the only way to get people to do what they need to do."
Gold thought "Who should we try it on first?"
SiIver thought.

112.content: Silver rose his finger into the air as he made a suggestion, “How about we recruit people like Sonic and his friends so that it will cause our time to change to match the new future we make instead of taking so long to mind control everyone of our present?” Gold liked the proposal but it had a major issue, “Silver as much as I like that idea we have to bear in mind that timeline has many powerful people on our level or even higher which gives us a great risk of failure while this timeline only has us among powerful being with no one likely able to stop us if we tried this on them.” Another strong point was made however Silver had a quick counterpoint, “How about we try a bit later then? I at one point travelled to the point thirty years after I originally met Sonic and he had managed to become king at that point but his age was starting to show while him and the others were preparing their children to take up the mantle of Mobius’ defenders but weren’t entirely ready with the assistance of their parents so the timing is perfect and if we run into some issue we can go back thirty years before that likely with knowledge of how to prevent the previous mistake.” Gold nodded her head as she listened to her companion as the last thing they needed to discuss was who to target once they made it to that point of time first.

12.content:
“Gold are you crazy that would make us no better than them?!” The hedgehog was shocked and appalled by what he was hearing from his trusted ally as he close his eyes to think as he tried comprehending Gold’s reasoning not expecting the her to suddenly shove the mask onto his face.
“Wha-“ Silver reached for the mask but his hands stopped midway as they started to shake while the dots on the mask changed from white to yellow, once the colors changed the hedgehog’s arms dropped as he spoke up in a very monotone voice: “Subject now serves Mistress Gold, what is your first command?” Gold sighed as she looked at Silver in his current state, if only he were able to understand her logic then maybe she wouldn’t have to have done this to him but as he was now she did start coming up with some ideas for the fallen hero...

13.content: Silver was disturbed by the suggestion his friend gave as he saw taking away someone’s will to make them as bad as the council. “Please Gold couldn’t we-“ Silver was caught off guard by the look of anger Gold gave in response as it was clear she was deadset on this now with or without his help. Luckily for Silver he did have the ability of mind control however he didn’t like using it but perhaps making Gold forget about this idea was the only thing he could do however he forgot that she was able to hear his thoughts as when Silver made his move she did a move herself in retaliation as both friends began a struggle against each other in a fight of dominance on the mental landscape.

131.content:
Despite Gold’s best efforts Silver was far more experienced in terms of fighting and used that to his advantage as the tenrac lost the idea of mind controlling the populace as both returned back to the present.
“What just...” Gold shook her head in confusion as she had no idea why she was there or how she got there but quickly noticed the mask she was holding and dropped it with disgust causing it to break in half upon landing. “The mask somehow took control of you again and I followed you here, it must’ve wanted you to find the council or something.” Silver lied through his teeth but it seemed she believed him. “Then I must thank you again great hero for being exactly what I needed at the right time...how could I ever repay you?” The end of that sentence seemed quite flirtatious as Silver caught on as he wrapped his arms around her as she was pulled in close as he smirked, “Oh I can think of a few ideas.” And with that they simultaneously went in for a kiss...
——————-
(Continuing just Incase someone wants a villain to be doing the brainwashing with gold and silver as the heroes—TG)
A few days later, unknown to the lovebirds, someone else took the mask, determined to execute the plan to brainwash the past without them.

Once Silver managed to win both returned back Gold looked around confused as the hedgehog was successful in making her forget her mission however Silver took advantage of her confusion by using his power to suddenly propel the mask onto her face while also giving another attack on the extremely vulnerable tennarc’s mind.

Both Silver and Gold looked around as they found themselves outside of the former base of the Freedom Fighters which was currently being occupied by the Suppression Squad, "Should we target them first?" Gold whispered to Silver as they both looked through a window as they could see each of the villains sleeping thanks to it being nighttime however unaware that they were taking shifts through the night to make sure the Freedom Fighters didn't attack them at a vulnerable time: the person awake in question being Miles who was able to see the two intruders while hidden in the shadow of the base.

14115512.content:
Silver looked at the base, “If we timed this right, Metal sonic will be arriving any moment now. That will draw sonic out and most of the freedom fighters will be alone for breif moments as they prepare to take back the base.” Silver looked at the mask “We won’t be able to get Tails, Amy, Antione Or Sally since they’ll be meeting their counterparts in battle and we can’t risk them holding back.”
He rubbed his chin “That leaves Rotor and Nicole who will be needed to get Sonic and Amy to Moebius, so we’d be able to set up the other to go under our control afterwards.”
He looked up at the Sky “Bunnie will be facing Rotors opposite, so if we’re careful she can still win and probably get him to our side.”
Gold spoke up “But shouldn’t we get Sally now? If she’s commanding everyone we can have her change up her commands and with my help they’ll defeat the Suppression Squad without needing to team up with them.”
Silver hesitated

141155125.content:
Silver shook his head “No... they’re all to risky, we should try someone who’s not involved.”
Gold tilted her head “Not involved?”
Silver counted off on his fingers “We’ve got Mina Mongoose who’s Music career sets off Naugus’ take over in a few months. Hershey St. John who’s about to leave on the mission where she is forced to fake her own death. Her husband who betrays everyone after that. And....” he paused and looked at his hands “Me... the me that’s about to cause so much trouble by blaming all the wrong people for a betrayal that never really happened.”
Gold touched his shoulder as he started shaking “Maybe we should focus on something less personal... this seems to be upsetting you.”

143.content: A sigh came from the shadows as the albino echidna Doctor Finitevus made his presence known, “I was hoping you would be able to convince him willingly but I guess it will be done the hard way.” The tennarac turned around with her eyes now dulled with a blank expression on her face, “My apologies master I thought he would be swayed by a friend much easier.” “Don’t fret my pet I wouldn’t call this a failure as he can easily be recruited and he isn’t aware that I have made you mine so we have no chance of him attempting an attack on us.” Finitevus rubbed his chin as he thought of how to get the ivory hedgehog while also reflecting on how he managed to get to the far off future: while in his lab finishing up a concoction that once consumed would make someone be easily controlled by any command he gave a genesis portal suddenly opened up before him leaving him shocked but filled with glee of the possibilities that were quite literally dropped before him, running a warp ring around the edges before walking through which seemed to be the right thing to do as the portal close shortly after he made it through the other side but however the contact with the energy it gave off strengthened the warp ring to now be capable of traveling through time.

1431.content: Finitevus decided now was a proper way to test how strong his control was over his new servant while also taking care of a growing urge he gained after spending so long alone in his lab. “Remove your clothing and get on your knees.” Gold smiled as complied with her master’s command as she slowly removed her robes and undid her bra dropping it on top of the discarded robe and kneeled to ground looking up at Finitevus. “Do you want a blowjob master?” The albino echidna nodded as he presented his rod that was quickly swallowed whole with excitement. “Oh now that’s a good girl!” As Finitevus was enjoying the foreplay he heard what sounded like Silver walking into the entrance as he likely forgot to say something or made up his mind. “Crap...” Finitevus was in a tight spot that wouldn’t allow him to make Silver a servant for now however he did have a method of putting Silver in a temporary trance so he could be taken care of properly once Gold finished. “Anyone there?” Finitevus asked as the red symbol on his head began to glow, one look at that would make Silver fall into a trance but if he ran out without looking Finitevus could be in some trouble.

info.brief_description: Silver the Hedgehog and Gold the Tenrec Travel through time to brainwash a better future.
info.description:
After Defeating the council, Silvers friend Gold comes with a proposition.

General notes and Rules:
1. This is an adult story, do not participate in or read if you aren't old enough. If I suspect a chapter is written by a child, I will delete it.
2. A central charcter in this is Gold the Tenrec, a Bisexual telepath from the Sonic Universe Comics, please atleast read over her wiki page if a chapter your about to write involves her.
3. This story is primarily to appeal to mind control and brainwashing fetishes, that being said, not every chapter path needs to be sex sex and evil mind control. You can have legitamate drama or romance if the situation calls for it.
4. Do not force other fetishes into this unless you have some way to work them in naturally to the plot. Inflation, Scat, Vore, Gore and Diaper fetishes are out right not allowed because of the excess of those on other stories. (gender bending, mild expansion and bimbofication are examples of more acceptable fetishes, but do try to focus on the mind control)
5. Since one of the Characters is a Bi lady, Lesbian scenes are more encouraged than gay, but feel free to experiment.
6. No fan characters, theres plenty of blank slate characters from the comics and games that can be used inplace of a self insert and it's not fair to others to include a character that they wouldn't be able to know anything about. If I spot a fan character I will either delete your chapter or replace the character with a similar official character.
7. No sex scenes with Eggman, we don't need the nightmares. I won't say no humans but realize some people find Sonics 3 human girlfriends creepy.
info.pretty_title: Silver and Gold: Chrono Mind Control
